page.title: 10Securicor
page.content: {Securicor Parcels Depot}has been in {Salfords for 7yrs.}It employs 90 men and 8 office staff to record everything on computer.It handles{3000 {parcels}each day, all different shapes and sizes, using large lorries and small vans. Different coloured labels mean: Red: very quick, Blue: next day Orange: 3 days. All labels have 9 digit numbers. Parcels sent for delivery{worldwide, by ship/ plane. Smallest parcel sent was matchbox full of flies. Sometimes dangerous parcels e.g. bottles of acid, fragile paintings, even tough parcels like metal bars need to be handled carefully. They have delivered the 'World Cup' and the doors of the Space Shuttle. The Securicor computer is linked to the main computer in London which is 4 times bigger than a classroom-Nicholas
